review: Unfortunately I will have to recommend to stay away from this product.  When it works it is as good as any others on the market.  However before each and every use it must be unplugged from the wall outlet, wait a couple of minutes, plugged back into wall outlet and then and only then will the Fire stick reconnect and function as expected.  To date I have also also had to reload any and all login ids and passwords twice, for every application that was downloaded. To trouble shoot I have tried all available HDMI ports on both TVs where it is being used. No difference.  Each TV is a different make, model and level. aka one smart TV one regular LED. The smart TV identifies the Fire Stick during port selection but the fire stick will not function until going through the steps.A second note for those who do purchase to download a application select the "FREE" button.  Really Stupid set up. Should be labeled download or free download not just FREE.  As for help if needing any... don't bother there isn't any.

review: I have spent the past 30 minutes trying to get it to connect to my wifi, which it has a very good connection to and it is literally less than 5 feet away from. I am beyond frustrated and regretting my purchase. Amazon better fix this issue!Update: I am now going on day 2 of the fire stick refusing to connect to the internet. I do not recommend this product!
